logistics.title: Logistics & Shipping
logistics.description: We handle all aspects of international shipping and logistics to ensure your products arrive safely and on time.

items.question: What is the minimum order quantity?
items.answer: We require a minimum of one 20ft container, but you can mix and match any products to fill the container.

items.question: Are the products export ready?
items.answer: Yes, all products come with proper export documentation and meet international standards.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept various payment methods including bank transfers, letters of credit, and other secure payment options.

items.question: How long does shipping take?
items.answer: Shipping times vary by destination, typically 2-4 weeks for most international locations.
